title: Levi Strauss Signature Gold Men's Slim Straight Jeans (Available in Big & Tall)
description: Same great jeans, brand new name! Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. is now Levi Strauss Signature Gold
If you love the Levi’s 513 Slim Straight, you’ll love the Signature Gold Slim Straight
Vintage inspired denim (to capture our trendier consumer)
Classic fit: Mid-rise, slim through seat & thigh, straight leg opening

Made with premium denim that flexes and moves with you, Signature by Levi Strauss & Co.™ Men's Straight Slim Fit Jeans have a close fit and straight leg from the seat to the ankle. Versatile enough for any look or occasion, they're a pair you'll want to wear in heavy rotation.
